name: Wall Balls
how_to_perform:
1. Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a ball against the wall at chest height.
2. Explosively throw the ball up towards the ceiling while engaging your core and keeping your movements controlled.
3. Catch the ball as it comes back down, absorbing the impact with slightly bent knees and softly bent arms to minimize any unnecessary strain on the joints.
4. Quickly repeat the motion without pauses in between throws for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Wall Balls are a plyometric exercise that emphasizes explosive throws and catches while engaging core muscles and improving cardiovascular endurance
alternative_names: Medicine Ball Throws Against the Wall
